text:

-by Trista McKenzie, Contributing Writer; Image: Lamar Odom (Image Source: David Shankbone / Wikimedia Commons) Former NBA star Lamar Odom has been hospitalized in “serious” condition... More Amy Schumer Clarifies Her Thoughts on the Kardashians 13 October, 2015 
On Monday, Khloé Kardashian tweeted in defense of her healthy lifestyle after Amy Schumer poked fun at the E! star's weight loss on SNL during her Saturday night debut as host of the show.... More Charlize Theron in Talks to Replace Brad Pitt in The Gray Man 13 October, 2015 
Actress Charlize Theron is in talks to replace Brad Pitt in the big screen adaptation of “The Gray Man.” Pitt originally signed on to front the film in 2011, but he has since dropped... More
